comment: Main text block containing vertical Chinese characters, enclosed in a black border. The text appears to be a formal submission or dedication, mentioning '康熙三年十月' (Kangxi 3rd year, 10th month), and names such as 王惟恭, 葛滿, 向中正, etc., indicating officials involved in the presentation of a work titled '冕旒冰炭交集'. The structure suggests this is a title page or preface from an ancient Chinese printed book.
